mapper.select: SELECT rcomment.id as replyId,rcomment.content as rcontent, rcomment.rid,rcomment.gmt_create as cgmt_create, rcomment.uid as cuid,cuser.nickname as cname,cuser.avatar as cavatar, rcomment.touid as touid,tuser.nickname as tname FROM red_blog_comment_reply rcomment LEFT JOIN red_class_user cuser on rcomment.uid = cuser.id LEFT JOIN red_class_user tuser on rcomment.touid = tuser.id WHERE rcomment.id = #{rid}
